dahora.

Portal 2 is an amazing sequel. It could easily pass as a stand-alone game, but I recommend having played the first game beforehand. It answers some of the questions that players may have had by the end of Portal in the best possible way. It is much longer than the first game and introduces a lot more mechanisms, making the challenges even more complex and rewarding. Plus, the lines are funnier than ever and the character development is on point! There are a bunch of hidden rooms to explore and funny achievements to get. I had played this game a long time ago, but replaying it was a lot of fun and I actually discovered first-hand that the little details were so many that it was impossible to remember them all! The co-op levels, too, are extremely challenging and great fun to play with a friend!

[b][i]Według mnie świetna gra nic dodać nic ująć. Portal 2 jest trudniejszy od swojego poprzednika przez co staje sie ciekawsza lecz walka z bossem jest prostsza od tej z portal still alive. Klimat gry jest niepowtarzalny. Pomimo 8 lat na rynku gra wciąż jest ciekawa i kto jeszcze w nią nie grał polecam zagrać. Oprawa graficzna jest lekko przestarzała lecz w porównaniu do fabuły oraz gameplay'u nie ma znaczenia. Polecam bardzo zagrać <3[i][b]
